body:
>Do you mean that they're only included if any of the locales are German, rather than filtered out?

Yes, sorry!

>I think I'm also implicitly expecting that there can be only one locale filter active at a time,

Oh! Well, the code is set up to allow for multiple filters for certain properties. For instance, you can filter by multiple locales or releases, but things like 'status' and 'action name' can only have one selection:

![multi-filter example](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/20763551/bdfb6a3c-b6e7-11e6-8194-96b69e7fdd32.gif)

(pardon the lack of styling)

This can be altered as to how it works right now, not hard at all to only allow one per filter.
